subject: Use more accurate message in glance v2 api

values.-1: This patch needs further work before it can be merged
values.+1: Looks good to me, but someone else must approve

Patch Set 6: Code-Review-1

I'm not against including some of the exception that was originally raised, but it has to go through localization (i18n) before it is returned to the user, and we should probably be adding to the message that is logged, not ignoring that.

Patch Set 6:

I agree with you. A good finding is people always use i18n in message even in debug message. Sometimes the one exception is corresponding to multiple error cases, only the very low level code knows what the real reason is, and only it can make appropriate message that guides user to take action.

Patch Set 7: Code-Review-1

(1 comment)

I'm not convinced that you can get much clearer on image_data.py than the current messages. If kept as proposed, the translation functions needs to change.

Do you have specific reason to leave these "uninformational" messages for the ops to the log files?

Patch Set 7:

(1 comment)

Patch Set 7: Code-Review-1

I'm -1 until I can verify that the exception messages we're returning do not contain more detail than any user would need or would be considered an exposure (the e in CVE).

Patch Set 7: Verified-1

Merge Failed.

This change or one of its cross-repo dependencies was unable to be automatically merged with the current state of its repository. Please rebase the change and upload a new patchset.

Patch Set 7: Code-Review-1

This patch has been -1ed because it has not been updated in
>=2months. The patch also has either a -1/-2 from a core reviewer or a
-1 from Jenkins.

Please, update/rebase the patch if the lack of updates was actually a
lack of reviews or if you think the patch is still relevant.

**NOTE: This will be abandoned if no update is done in 1 week.**

If this action does not seem accurate, please, ping flaper87 on IRC
and he will gladly revert it. Sorry for the inconvenience and we look
forward to have more contributions from you.

Patch Set 7:

This patch was marked to be abanadoned >=7days ago.

It is now being abandoned because there was no update, feedback nor rebase in the aforementioned period. If this is a mistake, please, contact members of the glance team[0] and they'll promptly correct the error.

Thanks for your contribution. The Glance team looks forward to new contributions from you.
Abandoned
